summary: This is a cover letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, addressed to the Metropolitan Detention Center, transmitting discovery materials to inmate Ghislaine Maxwell in her criminal case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the correspondence; discovery materials are being sent to her at the Metropolitan Detention Center in relation to her criminal case.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The signatory of the letter, transmitting discovery materials on behalf of the U.S. Attorney's Office.

connections.description: Strauss, as the U.S. Attorney, is the prosecuting authority in the criminal case against Maxwell, and her office is transmitting discovery materials to the defendant.

events.title: Transmission of Discovery to Maxwell
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office sends discovery materials to Ghislaine Maxwell at the Metropolitan Detention Center via Federal Express.

locations: U.S. Department of Justice, Southern District of New York, The Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) Legal Department, 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The document is a formal cover letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office transmitting discovery to Ghislaine Maxwell in her criminal case (20 Cr. 330).
Ghislaine Maxwell was incarcerated at the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn, NY, under inmate number 02879-509 as of January 2021.
Audrey Strauss was the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York at the time of this correspondence.
